name: PopLogin
author: Tradesouthwest

sections.description:
Create a basic yet stylable pop-up modal or page for users to login with that replaces the standard white screen WP Login page.

Features

  • Add company logo or personal image to login page
  • Choose between a login page or a popup box that displays login page.
  • Personal login page give your site that personal touch
  • Choose which menu to add login popup link on to.
  • Choose what font the title will use.
  • Create and change at any time, a welcome message or title.
  • Shortcode included for creating login page.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
1. Upload poplogin.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3. Go to Settings and configure font size and family.
sections.faq:
Q.: where is the controls for this plugin?
A.: You will find the setup under sub menu page to the Settings menu.

Q.: Can I change the form colors?
A.: If you know CSS then you can use any CSS editor to add a selctor in your Customizer or and other stylesheet. We intentionally left out this option so there would not be any conficlts with theme styles. You may find that the plugin will automatically recognize your styles and address accordingly. Otherwise the plugin selector is noted in the Sidenav Settings Control Panel.
